protocols.name: Municipal Dengue Containment Protocol
actions: Dispatch fogging trucks to high-risk zones (Cluster A/B) within 24 hours.
Launch public awareness SMS campaign regarding 'stagnant water'.
Alert local clinics to prepare for platelet count testing surge.

protocols.name: Urban Flash Flood Mitigation
actions: Deploy mobile suction pumps to low-lying areas (detected coordinates).
Issue 'Orange Alert' for commuters avoiding underpasses.
Notify electricity board to secure substation perimeters.

protocols.name: Extreme Heat Action Plan
actions: Open cooling shelters in community centers.
Suspend outdoor municipal work between 12 PM - 4 PM.
Deploy water tankers to water-scarce zones.

protocols.name: VIP Movement & Event Traffic Management
actions: Extend traffic light 'Green' duration by 20% on arterial routes.
Deploy traffic marshals to choke points.
Broadcast traffic diversion route via App/Radio.
